text: Samuel Roger Horchow (July 3, 1928 â€“ May 2, 2020) was an American theatre producer and businessman. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. In 1992, he produced his first Broadway show, Crazy for You, for which he won the Tony Award for Best Musical. He also produced versions of Kiss Me, Kate, Curtains and Gypsy. Horchow died in Dallas, Texas on May 2, 2020 of cancer, aged 91.Roger Horchow, Mail-Order Magnate And Broadway Producer, Dies At 91 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Theatre producers Category:Businesspeople from Cincinnati
title: Roger Horchow
